type.description: Primary category of the rest point. Must be exactly one from the following list `categories`

categories.beach: Sandy or pebbly coastal area for swimming, sunbathing, and water activities
categories.mountain: Elevated natural area with hiking trails, viewpoints, and alpine activities
categories.forest: Wooded area with trails, camping, and nature immersion
categories.national_park: Protected natural area with wildlife, trails, and conservation focus
categories.city_park: Urban green space for relaxation, walking, and recreation
categories.historical_site: Location of historical importance (ruins, monuments, battlefields)
categories.museum: Institution displaying artifacts, art, or cultural items
categories.art_gallery: Space dedicated to visual art exhibitions
categories.religious_site: Place of worship or spiritual significance (temple, church, mosque, shrine)
categories.hotel: Accommodation establishment with rooms and amenities
categories.resort: Large accommodation with extensive facilities and activities
categories.villa: Private vacation home or luxury accommodation
categories.cafe: Casual establishment for coffee, light meals, and socializing
categories.street_food: Informal food vendors or market stalls
categories.nightclub: Venue for dancing and late-night entertainment
categories.shopping_mall: Large retail complex with multiple stores
categories.local_market: Open-air or covered market selling local goods and food
categories.waterfall: Natural water feature where water flows over a vertical drop
categories.lake: Inland body of water for recreation and scenery
categories.river: Flowing water body with bankside activities
categories.cave: Natural underground chamber or series of chambers
categories.thermal_spring: Natural hot spring or spa with mineral waters
categories.garden: Cultivated area with plants, flowers, and landscaping
categories.zoo: Facility displaying live animals for public viewing
categories.amusement_park: Entertainment venue with rides and attractions
categories.adventure_park: Outdoor facility with adventure activities (ziplines, ropes courses)
categories.sports_venue: Stadium, arena, or facility for sports events
categories.wellness_center: Facility focused on health, spa treatments, and relaxation
categories.library: Public institution housing collections of books and media
categories.cultural_center: Venue for cultural events, performances, and workshops
categories.transport_hub: Major station for trains, buses, or ferries
categories.picnic_area: Designated outdoor area with facilities for picnicking
categories.campground: Designated area for camping with basic facilities
categories.hiking_trail: Marked path for walking in natural areas
categories.ski_resort: Mountain area with ski slopes and winter sports facilities
categories.marina: Dock or basin with moorings for pleasure boats
categories.island: Landmass surrounded by water, often with multiple attractions
categories.desert: Arid landscape with unique geological features
categories.volcano: Geological formation with volcanic activity or history
categories.glacier: Large mass of ice with scenic and recreational value
categories.winery: Vineyard and wine production facility with tastings
categories.neighborhood: Distinct urban area with its own character
categories.square: Open public space in urban areas
categories.lighthouse: Coastal navigation aid with scenic value

natural_scenery: The scenic beauty of the natural environment, from 0 (not scenic) to 1 (extremely picturesque).
cultural_richness: The density and significance of cultural attractions (museums, temples, festivals), from 0 (none) to 1 (very rich).
adventure_level: The intensity of adventure and outdoor activities available, from 0 (calm/relaxed) to 1 (extreme/adrenaline-filled).
family_friendliness: Suitability for families with children, considering facilities and safety, from 0 (not suitable) to 1 (highly suitable).
beach_quality: Quality of the beach (sand, water clarity, cleanliness), from 0 (poor) to 1 (excellent).
mountain_terrain: Presence and prominence of mountainous landscape, from 0 (flat plain) to 1 (high, rugged mountains).
urban_vibrancy: The energy and bustle of the urban environment, from 0 (quiet/sleepy) to 1 (very vibrant/bustling).
food_variety: Diversity and quality of local cuisine and dining options, from 0 (limited/poor) to 1 (very diverse/excellent).
accommodation_quality: Overall quality of available lodging, from 0 (basic/low quality) to 1 (luxurious/high quality).
transportation_accessibility: Ease of access via public or private transport, from 0 (very difficult to reach) to 1 (very accessible).
cost_level: General expense level for accommodations, food, and activities, from 0 (very cheap) to 1 (very expensive).
safety: Perceived safety for tourists, from 0 (high risk/dangerous) to 1 (very safe).
relaxation_level: The peacefulness and calmness of the atmosphere, from 0 (noisy/chaotic) to 1 (extremely tranquil).
nightlife_intensity: Vibrancy of nightlife and evening entertainment, from 0 (none/nightlife ends early) to 1 (very intense/late-night).
historical_significance: The historical importance and preservation of historical sites, from 0 (little to no historical sites) to 1 (highly significant).
